titleStmt.title: Serious considerations for repressing of the increase of Iesvites, priests, and papists without shedding blood written by Sir R.C. and presented to King James of happie memory.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication supplied by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
